verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> concerning things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols:<s%> <S%G2192>We<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge.<s%> <S%G1108>Knowledge<s%> puffs <S%G5448>up,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> builds <S%G5448>up.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G1035>eating<s%> of things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> no <S%G1497>idol<s%> is <S%G3762>anything<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> there is <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1487>but<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1520>one.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1512>though<s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> things that are <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2316>"gods,<s%>" <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth;<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2316>"gods<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2962>"lords;<s%>"

<S%G235>yet<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> there is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> live <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G235>However,<s%> that <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>isn't<s%> in all <S%G3956>men.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5100>some,<s%> with <S%G4893>consciousness<s%> of the <S%G1497>idol<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now,<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of a thing sacrificed <S%G2193>to<s%> an <S%G1494>idol,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G772>weak,<s%> is <S%G3435>defiled.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%> will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3936>commend<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3777>neither,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G5315>eat,<s%> are we the <S%G5302>worse;<s%> <S%G3777>nor,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat,<s%> are we the <S%G4052>better.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> be <S%G991>careful<s%> that by no <S%G3381>means<s%> does <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>liberty<s%> of <S%G5216>yours<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> a stumbling <S%G4348>block<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G770>weak.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>sees<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> who <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2621>sitting<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> an <S%G1493>idol<s%>'s temple, <S%G3618><s%> <S%G3780>won't<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> if he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G772>weak,<s%> be <S%G3618>emboldened<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1519><s%> things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols?<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G264>Thus,<s%> sinning <S%G3779><s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5180>wounding<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> when it is <S%G770>weak,<s%> you <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
